definition: Ministry of Railways (MOR), disbanded in 2013 with its regulatory functions taken over by the Ministry of Transport 交通運輸部|交通运输部[Jiao1 tong1 Yun4 shu1 bu4]

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The Railway Ministry has also ordered a two-month safety review of railway operations.
sentences.chinese: 铁道部长也已经下令将开展为期两个月的安全检查。

sentences.english: I commend the indian railways for thier strong and positive stand.
sentences.chinese: 我很赞同印度铁道部这种坚定的立场。

sentences.english: It told the news agency Xinhua the ministry still enjoys strong government support.
sentences.chinese: 大公对新华社说，铁道部依然享有政府的强有力支持。

sentences.english: China's railway minister, Sheng Guangzu, was reported to have rushed to the scene.
sentences.chinese: 据报道，中国铁道部部长盛光祖已经火速赶往现场。

sentences.english: Online demands abound that the railway minister, Sheng Guangzu, lose his job too.
sentences.chinese: 网络热呼铁道部长盛光祖引咎辞职。

sentences.english: Mr. Ghulam Muhammad Bilor Pakistani Railways Minister, should be sent to China for some times only.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦铁道部长应当去中国待一段时间。

sentences.english: Railways ministry spokesman dismissed from office.
sentences.chinese: 铁道部发言人王勇平离任。

sentences.english: Cafe bikes are not operated on trains by the Railways.
sentences.chinese: 列车上有吸烟休息室的餐车由铁道部门经营。

sentences.english: Will the railway minister introduce a train that would travel in 5 hours?
sentences.chinese: 铁道部是否能引进一种能在5小时内跑完的火车？

sentences.english: The Ministry of Railways said train T195 derailed from the track before the collision.
sentences.chinese: 铁道部称T195次列车在相撞前已出轨。

sentences.english: Ministry of Railways relevant departments and units directly under the charge of people take part in the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 铁道部有关司局和直属单位负责人参加了会议。

sentences.english: Joint Venture Division of Development and Planning.
sentences.chinese: 铁道部发展计划司合资处。

sentences.english: Article 3 The connection of special railway lines with national railways must be approved by the Ministry of Railways.
sentences.chinese: 第三条铁路专用线与国铁接轨必须经铁道部批准。

sentences.english: The official state media took Mr. Wen’s broadside as a pass to keep digging into Railways Ministry incompetence.
sentences.chinese: 官方国家媒体借此继续调查铁道部的失职。

sentences.english: After a meeting sponsored by the people from the ministry, all of us attended an exam.
sentences.chinese: 会后，全体报名的人员参加了铁道部派员举行的考试。

sentences.english: The leaders of the ministry of railway put forward a request again for high railway service quality.
sentences.chinese: 铁道部门领导再次向全体职工提出了端正路风的要求。

definition: PRC State Planning Committee, abbr. for 國家計劃委員會|国家计划委员会[Guo2 jia1 Ji4 hua4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]

PRC State Planning Committee, set up in 1952, replaced in 1998 by State Development and Planning Committee 國家發展計劃委員會|国家发展计划委员会[Guo2 jia1 Fa1 zhan3 Ji4 hua4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4] then in 2003 by National Development and Reform Commission 國家發展和改革委員會|国家发展和改革委员会[Guo2 jia1 Fa1 zhan3 he2 Gai3 ge2 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]
pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Ji4 hua4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: Beijing-Shanghai High-Speed Railway, completed in 2010/abbr. for 京滬高速鐵路|京沪高速铁路
Commission for Science, Technology and Industry for National Defense (COSTIND)/abbr. to 國防科工委|国防科工委[Guo2 fang2 Ke1 Gong1 Wei3]
pinyin: Guo2 fang2 Ke1 xue2 Ji4 shu4 Gong1 ye4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
related.word: 国防科学技术工业委员会

pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Quan2 guo2 Zong3 gong1 hui4

definition: Military Commission of the Communist Party Central Committee
PRC State Development and Planning Committee, set up 1998 to replace State Planning Committee 國家計劃委員會|国家计划委员会, replaced in 2003 by National Development and Reform Commission 國家發展和改革委員會|国家发展和改革委员会
